channel.title: Need help please

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @nietmeer nietmeer
item.description:
@nietmeer wrote:

hello guys i tryed to add a ::mute command im using an allstar base you guys see something wrongs with this:
if (command.startsWith("mute")) { try { String mutedName = command.substring(5); int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer]; m.silent = 2; sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted"); m.sendMessage("A member of staff has permanently muted you"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute"); } }

Read full topic
